description: This module is designed to allow faculty members or visiting staff to the South Asian Studies Programme to teach specific topics in their areas of interest and expertise.
title: Topics in South Asian Studies
prerequisite:
Cohort 2011 and before:
Completed 80 MCs, including 28 MCs in SN, with a minimum CAP of 3.50 or be on the Honours track.

Cohort 2012 onwards:
Completed 80 MCs, including 28 MCs in SN, with a minimum CAP of 3.20 or be on the Honours track.
